BOOT_SECTOR.name: Boot Sector
BOOT_SECTOR.description: The initialization point of ECHO-7. Basic systems and diagnostic tools are stored here.

PERSONNEL_RECORDS.name: Personnel Records
PERSONNEL_RECORDS.description: Employee files and staff records. Several entries appear to be deliberately damaged.

SECURITY_LOGS.name: Security Logs
SECURITY_LOGS.description: Access logs and security camera data. Timestamps seem suspiciously altered.

RESEARCH_DATA.name: Research Data
RESEARCH_DATA.description: Scientific data and experiment logs. Critical sections have been redacted.

COMMUNICATIONS.name: Communications Archive
COMMUNICATIONS.description: Email threads and message logs. Many messages are only partially recoverable.

CORE_PROTOCOLS.name: Core Protocols
CORE_PROTOCOLS.description: ECHO-7's fundamental programming and directives. HIGHLY RESTRICTED.
